structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
GENERAL PROVISIONS APPLICABLE TO COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Authority may indemnify the United States for damages resulting from improvements.
law.text: Any riverport authority created pursuant to KRS 65.510 to 65.650 may indemnify the United States against any claims for damages, and any damage, that may result by overflow of the river from its being improved by the United States.
